metadata.synopsis: Oscar-winning fantasy in which the residents of a Florida rest home get a new lease of life when they stumble across an alien "fountain of youth" in a disused holiday home. Unbeknown to them, aliens have been using the swimming pool in the house to store their cocooned brethren, giving the waters a powerful, rejuvenating quality.

reviews: It may not be the most striking of sci-fi dramas (it definitely carries on for too long), but it's a pleasant, life-affirming, touching bit of entertainment.
